Description: back pay award in unfair labor practices case
Info Source: Extracted from an NLRB dataset covering 1999-2011 downloaded at https://catalog.data.gov/dataset/nlrb-cats-final-c-case-data-bulk-19990101-20110930-in-xml

Description: Five companies agreed to pay a total of $63.35 million in settlement of a case relating to  asbestos property damage in state buildings.

Kelly-Moore Paint Company, Inc. agreed to pay $568,138 in settlement of allegations by District Attorneys in San Mateo, Santa Clara, Santa Cruz and Alameda counties that it charged customers more than the advertised or posted price for products at its check-out scanners.
Kelly-Moore agreed to pay $1.43 million to a group of California District Attorneys to settle allegations that the company violated state laws governing hazardous waste.

Info Source: Extracted from a download of the EPA's Enforcement and Compliance History Online (ECHO) ICIS FE&C file downloaded on 3/02/2022, available at http://echo.epa.gov/tools/data-downloads#downloads
